title: When Big Brother Is An Evil, Jewelry-Obsessed Necromancer
teaser: Lord of the Rings fans wanted to build a giant Eye of Sauron atop a skyscraper in Moscow, a place that already can make you feel you're being watched. The Orthodox church had officials scrap the plan.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
